txt.en: Instance: A Journey Into Danger
Talk to Rahâzi inside the waggon
<rgb=#00FF00>Listen</rgb> for anyone who might approach
Stand near the back of the waggon
'TBD - Blah!'
Wait for the driver to leave before departing the waggon
'TBD - Blah!'
'TBD - Blah!'
You hear the crunching of footsteps beside the waggon
Together, you and Rahâzi have snuck aboard a waggon carrying supplies and must remain hidden from the Temámir who drives it.
You should stand near the back of the waggon and <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> for anyone to approach too near.
Rahâzi is hidden inside the waggon.
If the driver moves away, it should be safe to depart the waggon.
You should stand near the back of the waggon and <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> for anyone to approach too near.
Do not move, and make no noise!
Rahâzi is hidden inside the waggon.
It will be some time before the waggon arrives. Now you can only wait.
Talk to Rahâzi inside the waggon
Rahâzi is hidden inside the waggon.
Stand near the back of the waggon
<rgb=#00FF00>Listen</rgb> for anyone who might approach
Try not to move or make any noise
Talk to Rahâzi inside the waggon
Pass the time while the waggon rumbles to its destination
'I hear you.'
'I will be back as soon as I can. And with gold!'
'TBD PHRASE! Hya!'
'Fine enough. But the road is a thirsty one.'
It is difficult to mark the passage of time as the waggon rumbles onward
The driver has returned to the side of the waggon
'Stand by the back of the waggon and listen for anyone to approach.'
'We have stopped! Have we arrived?'
'I think he has gone. Let us see where we have come!'
